body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the cost!
reviews.reviewText: I looked long and hard before settling on the Cuisinart. It's really four appliances in one: toaster oven, convection oven, broiler, and air fryer. I resisted buying an air fryer because I didn't want another one use appliance, so I looked long and hard before settling on this option. I use it almost every day sometimes multiple times. It bakes very well, and the air frying function comes from the convection option. It has a large enough space for a large lasagna and is so versatile I am constantly discovering new uses for it. In the summer months when I don't want to turn on the over, it is terrific. I don't know how I got along without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars getting great use out of it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only lasted eight months
reviews.reviewText: "erl" error code suggests capacitor or circuit board issue, of course refurb warranty was only 90 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars CERY DIFFICULT TO CLEAN
reviews.reviewText: I bought a brand new one and it has been great except that it is impossible to clean the interior. It seems to be aluminum inside but I’m not sure. The instructions booklet says not to use abrasive cleaners and not to put cleaning solution directly on the interior walls. Cleaning solution should be applied directly on the sponge used to clean the interior. Well, anything that splashes grease during cooking is going to splash it all over the inside of the oven and a soft sponge with cleaning solution on it is not going to do the job. Consequently, you will end up with a dirty oven and no way to clean it. Other than that, my oven has worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have three regular ovens, but use this one 99% of the time
reviews.reviewText: Very nice small oven for everyday needs. I put an aluminum foil on the rack to keep it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a real step up from my cheap Oster. don't get me wrong, i used that old Oster for years and it was a workhorse, but this oven is a giant step up. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished not worth it
reviews.reviewText: Product worked great for about 7 months. Suddenly an error code showed up one day and it won’t work with all the troubleshooting we tried. Limited warranty only covers 90 days. Either buy the extended warranty or skip the refurbished product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice countertop oven
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoying our new countertop oven thus far. Controls are straightforward, oven volume is larger, toasts, bakes and convection oven too. Looks good on the counter.
